channel.title: raspbian on Dave Svatora
channel.description: Recent content in raspbian on Dave Svatora

item.title: Pi4
item.description: I got a Raspberry Pi 4 recently to play around with on some home projects. I am going to try to see if its functional as a developer machine as well as run some dockerized apps on it. This post will document my experience and steps to get stuff up and running. Most of the documentation I do is essentially bread crumbs that I can later use to recreate something if I decide to blow it away and start over.
